description.narrative: The proposed project development objective is to enhance the corporate governance and operational efficiency of the supported Afghan state-owned banks, thereby contributing to their improved financial soundness and outreach.

sector.narrative: Financial Sector oversight and policy/banking regulation & restructuring

condition.narrative: MoF is to establish, by not later than two (2) months after the Effective Date of the Project, and thereafter maintain throughoutthe implementation of the Project, the Project Steering Committee, chaired by the Deputy Minister in charge of the AFD, withmembership, mandate, composition, and terms of reference acceptable to the Association, to be responsible for overall guidance andoversight of the Project.

MoF shall establish, by not later than two (2) months after the Effective Date, and thereafter maintain throughout Projectimplementation, a grievance redress mechanism for the Project, with staffing and operating procedures acceptable to theAssociation, for monitoring and addressing the concerns of people affected by the Project and building public and stakeholdersupport for the Project.

MoF shall, by no later than 2 months after the Effective Date appoint a Project Management Team within AFD’s regular structure,headed by a project director and provided with sufficient resources and competent staff in adequate numbers, under terms ofreference satisfactory to the Association, comprising, inter alia, a chief technical expert and a banking expert, and staffresponsible for the financial management, procurement, monitoring and evaluation, and gender and social safeguards activities ofthe Project.

title.narrative: Percentage point increase in SB client satisfaction rate (disaggregated by gender)
Increase in the number of Digital Financial Services users in SBs (disaggregated by gender)
Increased outreach of SBs (measured by number of SBs clients served)
Improved Soundness of SBs (Measured by average adjusted ROE)
Improved Financial Soundness of SBs (SBs meet the central bank's minimum capital requirements)
Improved efficiency (Measured by average adjusted Operating Income Margin)
Improved operational efficiency of SBs (Measured by System uptime)
Improved oversight capacity of MoF as per OECD Guidelines
Effective Governance of SBs in line with key OECD guidelines

actual.value: Board composition: Five member board in place in one bank, one bank only has three members and the other four.

title.narrative: All senior management functions have been filled and performance contracts in place for CEOs

baseline.value: Vacancies in senior management functions of SBs. No Performance contract in place.

target.value: All senior management functions are filled in SBs; Performance management contracts in place for CEOs.

actual.value: There are still vacant senior management positions of State Banks. Performance contracts for the CEOs of the three Banks wereapproved by supervisory boards of each of the three banks.
